short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save and re-use prompts for OpenAI, Gemini, Copilot and other AI tools.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
==============================
FEATURES

☆ Save and re-use prompts
☆ Add prompts by selecting the text on a web page or via the extension toolbar button
☆ Store prompts securely in your browser only in offline mode
☆ Inserts prompts by right clicking on a text input area
☆ Sync prompts across browsers
